extension.name: Socbuttons
extension.author: tallib
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description:
Installed version 1.5. Download the latest version of the plugin Social Share Buttons Plugin
Plugin SocButtons allows you to display in the articles buttons such social networks:

*Google +1
*Facebook
*Twitter
*LinkedIn
*Vkontakte
*Ya.ru
*Odnoklassniki.ru
*My.mail.ru

Donate (PayPal):
Go to PayPal
